name: Call of Crusades [ALPHA]
description:
[The game is in Alpha version]

this version of the game only show only how to use the character -no enemies-

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Dash, Attack and Climb . The plataformer game bring old game memories.

The game is a fantasy plataformer based on skills [dash, attack and climb].

Your character will be magic. Uses magic habilities to confront the enemies

Returning from the Middle Age . Your character will be confront in the Call of Crusades.
